Introduction

Yan An is a Chinese singer best known as the sub-vocalist and visual of PENTAGON. He debuted with the group on October 10, 2016, with the mini-album PENTAGON.

On August 22, 2018, Cube Entertainment announced that Yan An would go on hiatus due to health reasons. He resumed group activities in September 2020.
